summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of various logits processors used in language model generation, checking that they correctly adjust token probability distributions for constraints such as forced start/end tokens, minimum sequence length, temperature scaling, and top‑k/top‑p filtering, both in standard and JIT‑compiled execution paths.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of text generation pipelines by verifying that custom logits processing components enforce desired generation rules and performance optimizations, thereby improving model output quality and reliability.
